quality.title: Quality Assurance
quality.description: Our rigorous quality control process ensures premium products

steps.title: Sustainable Farming
steps.description: Our cashews are grown using organic methods on our 50-hectare family farm in Odienné, with first harvest expected in 2031.

steps.title: Quality Control
steps.description: Every batch undergoes rigorous quality checks to meet international standards for size, color, and taste.

steps.title: Efficient Distribution
steps.description: Vacuum-sealed packaging ensures freshness as our products travel from Ivory Coast to global markets.

quality.title: Quality Assurance
quality.description: We implement strict quality control measures at every stage of production to ensure our cashews meet the highest international standards.
bullets: Premium grade cashews with consistent sizing
Traceable to specific farms in our network
Regular laboratory testing for aflatoxins and contaminants

certifications.title: Our Certifications
certifications.subtitle: Meeting global standards for quality and sustainability

cta.title: Ready to Experience AfriNuts Quality?
cta.subtitle: Contact us for wholesale inquiries, product samples, or to discuss future availability

items.name: Raw Cashew Nuts
items.description: Sun-dried, hand-sorted cashews from our family farm and trusted partner growers
features: Grade A quality with 95% whole nuts
Traceable to specific farms in Odienné region

items.name: Cashew Kernels
items.description: Precision-processed kernels from our future processing facility

items.name: Cashew Butter
items.description: 100% pure, single-origin cashew butter with no additives
features: Creamy texture from premium Ivory Coast cashews
Rich in healthy fats (18g per serving)

items.name: Cashew Nut Shell Liquid (CNSL)
items.description: High-value industrial byproduct from our processing operations
features: Used in paints, varnishes and brake linings

items.name: Roasted Cashews
items.description: Premium dry-roasted cashews with optimal crunch
features: Three varieties: Natural, Lightly Salted, Spiced
Rich in copper, magnesium and antioxidants
